“Passer en mode projet c’est décider de sprinter un marathon en se préservant de la fatigue et des blessures.”

SEVEN

Our workshops about Gestion de projet

MANAGING CHANGE

“The only person who likes change is a wet baby.” – Mark Twain


During this workshop, participants will learn what are the universal mechanisms everyone is experiencing when facing change.

For every step of our method, participants will take practical 'for actions', helping them controlling change instead of enduring it.

BEING « EFFICIENT » WITH THE LAWS OF TIME


During this amusing and interactive workshop, participants will learn a unique toolset to negate the influence of the 7 laws of time over their activities, and thus be more efficient.

In order to be more efficient in managing priorities, participants will identify those laws and their impact on daily work.

MANAGING PRIORITIES


Based on their everyday activities, participants will build their orwn Eisenhower matrix.

With help from our trainers, participants will take corrective measures to rid themselves of 'polluting' activities and focus on their more productive tasks.

Any workshop or module you would love to add to your training program ?

We regurlarly create and expand our workshops catalog. We wish to make a coherent, connected and evolutive repertoire out of it. Let's talk about your needs, and explore together the possibilities.
